info.name: LDAP Contacts
info.description:
# LdapContacts View other LDAP users as contacts in Nextcloud and see the personal data they shared.
### Features * view all LDAP users as contacts * search these users * restrict your search to certain LDAP groups * hide certain users and groups from the contacts app * define which LDAP attributes are available for your contacts
### Requirements * active LDAP authentification (check [Nextcloud admin manual](https://docs.nextcloud.com/server/latest/admin_manual/configuration_user/user_auth_ldap.html) for details) * php 7.0
info.author: Alexander Hornig
